TEXT: e1: We should go to the Baltic Sea on the weekend.
CN RELATION: we, go to Baltic Sea (CapableOf)/we, at Baltic Sea (AtLocation)

TEXT: e2: According to the weather report it'll be perfect beach weather,
CN RELATION: weather report, perfect beach weather (HasA)/perfect beach weather, weather report (PartOf)/weather, perfect (HasProperty)

TEXT: e3: and one mustn't let this go to waste,
CN RELATION: perfect beach weather, letting go to waste (NotCausesDesire)

TEXT: e4: even if I do have to prepare a presentation for Tuesday.
e5: Besides, I get to use my folks' big, comfy car.
CN RELATION: my folks, car (HasA)/I, use car (CapableOf)/car, big (HasProperty)/car, comfy (HasProperty)/car, used (ReceivesAction)
